Jx.Sort

Base class for all of the sorting algorithm classes.

Extends: Jx.Object

Events

onStart()called when the sort starts
onEnd()called when the sort stops

Example

Summary
Jx.SortBase class for all of the sorting algorithm classes.
Options
timeItwhether to time the sort
Events
onStart
onEnd
Functions
init
sortActually does the sorting. 
setDatasets the data to sort
setColumnSets the column to sort by
setComparatorSets the comparator to use in sorting



Options



timeIt
whether to time the sort



Events



onStart



onEnd



Functions



init
init : function ()



sort
Actually does the sorting.  Must be overridden by subclasses.



setData
setData : function (data)
sets the data to sort
Parameters
datathe data to sort



setColumn
setColumn : function (col)
Sets the column to sort by
Parameters
colthe column to sort by



setComparator
setComparator : function (fn)
Sets the comparator to use in sorting
Parameters
fnthe function to use as the comparator

Base class for all other object in the JxLib framework.
